location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Audit of the Bushire Resident's disbursements July 1815 to January 1816

mods.abstract: The entries in the Residency's disbursements that have been subject to audit are set out, with remarks from the Bombay Office of Audit and references to relevant orders of Government, signed by John Kaye and Francis Warden respectively.On folio 38v a letter discussing other financial matters has been inserted, the description for that letter can be found at IOR/R/15/1/18, f 38v
